"We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

This product has been made with at least 70% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be planted and grown  again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock  instead of fossil fuel. 

This feedstock is  chemically processed into intermediate substances and  is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

By purchasing this product you are supporting regenerative organic cotton agriculture.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067

name: Terrex AX4 Hiking Shoes
description:
Know the carbon footprint of these do-it-all hiking shoes.With these adidas multisport hiking shoes, nothing stands in the way of your adventure. They're down for it all. Light enough for fast hikes and versatile enough for adventurous pursuits, they offer comfort on every journey. From forest paths to rocky terrain, abrasion-resistant mesh handles scuffs and scrapes, and an ultralight Lightstrike midsole provides long-lasting comfort without weighing you down. Wet or dry, Continental™ Rubber offers extraordinary grip. This product has a total footprint of 5.9 kg CO2e/pair. To understand what this means and how we measured it, please take a look into the FAQ section below.

For real change to happen, we need to accelerate towards decarbonization. To do that we first need to understand the impact we are already making so we can improve and have a bar to raise.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we measured the carbon footprint (CO2e) of this product, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067.

'90s-inspired trainers made in part with recycled materials.Your style game is about to go off. Taking design cues from the pre-Y2K era, these adidas shoes are made with today's generation in mind. They've got that future-facing vibe that spins any outfit with casual cool, accented by signature 3-Stripes that are never bound by time. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Cloud White / Core Black / Tech Indigo

name: X Crazyfast.1 Laceless Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
description:
Laceless cleats that optimize traction during rapid acceleration.Change the game in the X Crazyfast.1 Firm Ground Cleats. With a slick, semi-translucent Aeropacity Speedskin upper, these soccer cleats include reinforcements only where they're needed. The laceless adidas PRIMEKNIT offers a firm and comfortable fit, while SPEEDFRAME OUTSOLE with AEROPLATE is designed for propulsion and dynamic movement. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

name: adidas by Stella McCartney Court Slip-On Shoes
description:
Platform canvas sneakers made with nature.Casual and versatile, these adidas by Stella McCartney shoes transition with you through every part of your day. The silhouette inspiration comes from the past, but the material decisions are purely focused on the future, with organic cotton material, bio-based EVA cushioning and vegan alternatives. They're all-around minimalist trainers, but that doesn't mean there can't be some boldness thrown in — which the platform midsole takes care of.

These shoes are made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.
color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black

name: Crazy IIInfinity Shoes
description: Attention-getting adidas shoes with a futuristic silhouette.In a futuristic silhouette born from their polarizing predecessor, the Crazy 1, these adidas shoes truly speak for themselves. Beyond their looks, the groundbreaking trainers keep you comfortable with their mid-cut design, uniquely Molded sidewalls and breathable upper.
color: Core Black / Carbon / Cloud White

name: Ultraboost 22 Running Shoes
description: 4% MORE FOREFOOT ENERGY RETURN COMPARED TO ULTRABOOST 21 WITH A COMPLETE 360° FEMALE FIT IMPROVEMENT.With the help of 1.2 million foot scans, we updated Ultraboost with a complete 360° female fit improvement. And we didn't stop there. We re-engineered the rubber outsole. We tested hundreds of prototypes. We kept going until we saw visible improvements in performance. The result? 4% more forefoot energy return, compared to Ultraboost 21 for women. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes a narrower heel fit, designed to avoid heel slip and blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole with a Linear Energy Push system. The shoe's upper is made with yarn containing 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
color: Wonder Mauve / Wonder Mauve / Magic Mauve S22

name: Seattle Sounders Gazelle Shoes
description: A timeless shoe with club love.Your love for the game runs through your veins and across these adidas Seattle Sounders Gazelle shoes. Taking it back to their sport roots, these classic 3-Stripes shoes are decked out with colors and a logo that show your support for your club. Complete with a leather upper and that famous low-profile silhouette.
color: Cloud White / Semi Solar Slime / Gum

name: ZNSORED Shoes
description:
These lightweight sneakers pair equally well with tailored pants or jeans.A chunky outsole brings these classic skater-style sneakers up to the minute. They're made with an airy organic canvas upper and feature a padded collar for a supportive fit around your ankles. LIGHTMOTION+ cushioning provides elevated movement, so these adidas sneakers are great for bouncing between activities. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.
color: Grey Four / Gum / Gum

name: Trae Unlimited Basketball Shoes
description: Trae Young basketball shoes that provide smooth traction.Trae Young marches to the beat of his own drum. His signature adidas basketball shoes feature a low cut and a Bounce midsole that responds to your every move. The classic 3-Stripes have a serrated, textured design that goes from toe to midfoot. The rubber outsole with lateral grip zones gives you traction as you change directions or make quick cuts to the basket.
color: Metal Grey / Carbon / Better Scarlet

description:
An elevated take on iconic shoes by adidas x Wales Bonner.A nod to free-spirited expression, the Fall/Winter 2023 collection from adidas and Wales Bonner enlivens archival football silhouettes with technical refinement and an essence of elegance. 

The Samba Pony Leo Low Trainers harness creative energy and individuality of style. They pair a luxe leather upper with a rubber outsole, while the hallmark 3-Stripes and overlays reference the legacy look.

name: Adizero Boston 12 Running Shoes
description: Capable mid- to long-distance running shoes made in part with recycled materials.The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal, and a training plan and all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 12 Shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day feel to training with a propulsive feel that comes from the glass-fiber infused ENERGYRODS 2.0, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability — the midsole layers ultra-light Lightstrike Pro cushioning with a new version of durable Lightstrike 2.0 EVA.
color: Silver Violet S23 / Cloud White / Silver Dawn S23

name: ZNSORED Hi Shoes
description: Skate-style shoes with clean and classic design.Head out for the day, and know that these adidas shoes can handle whatever you throw at them. Modernizing a classic look, they have slightly higher tooling and a sleek shape. The premium leather upper provides easy-wearing comfort. The durable rubber outsole gives you traction at the park or on the street. All you have to do is pair them with crop or tapered pants.
color: Core Black / Core Black / Grey Six

name: TERREX FREE HIKER 2 MWN
description:
These Terrex hiking boots are made with nature.The Terrex Free Hiker shoes are designed for performance and comfort and built for the journey ahead. An adidas BOOST midsole provides superior cushioning and energy return, so you can feel comfortable and confident on long adventures in the mountains. An internal frame adds lateral stability as you navigate rocky trails and uneven surfaces, supporting your midfoot with every step. For moving fast over wet or dry terrain, the Continental™ Rubber outsole provides grippy traction, so you can feel secure in your footing. Whether you're out for a day-long expedition or you're spending the weekend covering long distances above the tree line, a sock-like fit delivers comfort over any surface or distance.

For this product we sourced leather differently by working with selected farming programs that take a closer look at farming practices and land management. So you get the same quality product, but we help contribute towards more responsible grazing practices which can help to build healthier soil.
color: Wonder Silver / Wonder Silver / Lucid Lemon

description: Precisely coded running shoes made in part with recycled materials.Every day is an opportunity to improve: your expectations, your outlook, your run. The Ultra 4D is coded to help get you there, starting with a 3D-printed 4D midsole designed to stabilize your ride. Long-lasting cushioning helps you go the distance, and adidas PRIMEKNIT wraps your foot for support through every stride.

description: Signature basketball shoes from Damian Lillard.When the game is on the line, there's nobody better to have the ball in their hands than Damian Lillard. Built to match Dame's unique style, both on and off the court, the latest Damian Lillard signature sneakers from adidas Basketball have all the tools you need to deliver in the clutch. The Bounce midsole is lightweight and flexes with your foot, while the rubber outsole supports starts and stops whether you're pulling up for a game-winner from the logo or attacking the rack for two points in the paint.
color: Blue Rush / Cloud White / Carbon

name: TERREX AX4 Mid GORE-TEX Hiking Shoes
description: Versatile, waterproof hiking shoes made in part with recycled materials.The outdoors is made for exploring, and these adidas waterproof Terrex hiking shoes are built to explore high and low, near and far. Their multi-sport design is light enough for day hikes and technical enough for alpine scrambles and via ferratas. They support your feet with a lightweight yet rugged and stable feel, so you can focus on your route. Waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX seals out water and mud while letting your feet breathe. A gusseted tongue and ankle-height cuff hug the foot and seal out dust and debris for running-shoe-inspired comfort. The all-conditions grip of Continental™ Rubber means you can move with confidence across rocky scree, wet roots and loose, dusty trails. Lace up, and get out there.

description: Casual suede sneakers for easy everyday wear.Lace-up a pair of adidas Gazelles and feel the vintage vibes. A stretchy knit upper crafted from recycled materials hugs your foot for comfort on the go. This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.
color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Silver Metallic

name: adidas 4DFWD 2 Running Shoes
description:
Innovation that keeps you moving forward.adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement. The PRIMEKNIT and the stripes are made with reflective material to help you stay seen.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: White Tint / Zero Metalic / Shadow Navy S22

name: Y-3 Kaiwa
description:
A modern runner style by Y-3."Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Pulling from the archives, Y-3 returns a running silhouette to the streets with the progressive Kaiwa shoes. A minimalist design philosophy exposes the roots of the pioneering sport style. The sock-like build is crafted with a premium leather and neoprene upper and offers enhanced comfort with lightweight cushioning.

name: Stan Smith Lux Shoes
description:
Classic Stan Smith shoe with luxury details and premium leather."I've always thought of [the Stan Smith] like a canvas. The designers at adidas have done many different iterations — not only colors, also materials — but the silhouette stays the same and you can always recognize it from a long way away" — Stan Smith

The time-honored silhouette gets an update in the Stan Smith Lux. With a clean and genderless look that nods to the OG, this iteration is effortlessly elevated with premium details. The court-inspired shoe is crafted entirely from buttery-soft leather, from the inner lining to the extra leather patch in the heel that provides heightened comfort and durability. The foil branding on the tongue is a simple yet elegant finish.
color: Crystal White / Off White / Core Black

name: Hyperturf Adventure Shoes
description: Outdoor-inspired shoes for perennial seekers.It's all in the name. These adidas Hyperturf Adventure Shoes have all you need for your next excursion in nature or the city. Lock in your bungee laces and make your mark.

description: Vintage-style shoes in wearable earth tones.Still making an impression. After adidas' Samba shoes made their name in sports they went on to find a place among the fashion-forward in numerous subcultures. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 20% total of these materials.

description:

With the need for the shoe to provide all day comfort but also deliver across the contact points on and off the bike, the mid-sole EVA technology provides the necessary comfort without losing the all-important pedal stability. The Trailcross GTX utilises a reinforced upper for added stability, additionally a neoprene hook and loop ankle cuff helps to keep debris out of the shoe.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney Seeulater Shoes
description:
Durable, water-repellent hiking shoes made with recycled and vegan materials.The inspiration of these adidas by Stella McCartney hiking boots is clear — mountaineering equipment. Climbing rope laces lock your feet in securely and comfortably. Add in the rugged, durable outsole, you can feel confident in your footing as you take on unpredictable terrain. Speaking of unpredictability in nature, when the weather shifts, the breathable, water-repellent mesh upper makes sure you can still get after your adventure. With these shoes, very little stands in your way.

We only label products as made with vegan materials if they were previously created with leather, suede or down. 

This vegan product also features at least 20% recycled materials.
color: Crew Yellow / Cloud White / Unity Orange

name: Ultraboost 1.0 Shoes
description:
Supportive daily shoes made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.From everyday errands to exploring the city, these adidas Ultraboost shoes bring undefeated comfort. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper is designed to hug your feet for all-day support. The BOOST midsole feels like you're walking on clouds. Your go-to shoes for everyday action.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
color: Pink Fusion / Pink Fusion / Gold Metallic

name: Ultraboost 1.0 Nebraska
description:
Running shoes for Cornhuskers fans, made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Bring your Cornhuskers spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign is Nicklin Hames; Nicklin is a senior Nebraska Cornhusker volleyball player from Maryville, TN, where she played for an adidas-sponsored club volleyball program. As an NU team captain, she’s led her team to two national championship matches. Nicklin has received All-American recognition each year she’s been at Nebraska, and was honored as Most Outstanding Player in 2021. For the 2023 season, she plans to stay on as a graduate assistant, beginning her coaching career.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
color: Cloud White / Scarlet / Core Black

Grippy cleats for pinpoint shooting, made in part with recycled materials.Top corner. Bottom corner. All the corners. adidas Predator Accuracy is crafted for goalscoring, so you know the ball will find the net. The fun's in choosing how it gets there. These artificial grass soccer cleats have a soft HybridTouch upper with High Definition Grip rubber elements that deliver biting grip on the ball without compromising forefoot flexibility. A Power Facet in the split outsole supercharges strikes.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Bright Royal / Cloud White / Bliss Blue

description:
Iconic shoes made with vegan materials.Your favorite mouse teams up with your favorite shoes. Who's that we're talking about? Why, Disney's Minnie Mouse and the adidas Samba of course. Aside from bringing style and fun to your feet, they're also joining forces in the effort to help end plastic waste. Minnie Mouse's hands on each shoe form a heart when right and left feet are side by side. Because we can accomplish anything if we just stick together. 

This product is made with animal free ingredients to offer you a vegan option.

name: Ultraboost 1.0 Miami
description:
Running shoes for Hurricanes fans, made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Bring your Hurricanes spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign is Moriah Oliveira, a decorated sophomore on the University of Miami’s track & field team, from Fort Myers, FL. She’s a two-time 400m state champion, a 200m state champion, and a four-time district 400m and 200m champion. Her family is from Hawaii, and she visits as often as she can, but not for the seafood – despite her island roots, she’s not a fan. Moriah plans to continue her running career after she graduates.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
color: Cloud White / Collegiate Orange / Dark Green

name: Cloudfoam Pure Shoes
description:
Streamlined shoes for your daily moves, made in part with recycled materials.No one gets it done like you do. Step into a pair of adidas shoes that can keep up. It's a versatile look, with that confident style you're known for. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Campus shoes that evolve the legacy, made in part with recycled content.The adidas Campus shoes have been a long-standing staple on our cultural landscape. With these Campus 00s trainers, we move the iconic silhouette in another direction, giving a crooked twist to the original collegiate colorways and playing with bigger proportions. They're done with a premium suede upper in faded tones, which rides on an off-white midsole — a clear connect to the Campus legacy.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

Designed for further, faster and freer experiences on short to long-distance hikes in any weather conditions, the shoes fuse a sock-like upper with a stretchable and soft rip-stop for the ultimate in comfort. Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock instead of fossil fuel.

This product has been made with at least 20% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be planted and grown again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock instead of fossil fuel.

This feedstock is chemically processed into intermediate substances and is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

This product has been made with at least 20% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be planted and grown again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock instead of fossil fuel.

This feedstock is chemically processed into intermediate substances and is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

The Five Ten Kestrel BOA is a downcountry shoe from Five Ten which pairs XC performance with Five Ten's gravity credentials and mountain bike expertise.The Five Ten Kestrel BOA is a dedicated downcountry shoe that unites XC efficiency with adidas Five Ten's footwear excellence. 

A full-length plate made in part with repurposed materials and reinforced with glass fiber provides excellent power transfer with added pedal stability. 

Engineered for the most demanding rides, the Kestrel BOA is the shoe of choice for the modern rider.
color: Legend Ink / Core Black / Coral Fusion S23

name: Adilette Comfort Slides
description: Comfortable sandals featuring an energetic design.From yoga on the beach directly to brunch? We've got you covered. You'll move with easy freedom all summer in these comfortable slip-ons. These adidas slides feature a playful floral print, giving you a kick of extra energy and style wherever you go.

name: Handball Spezial Shoes
description: A style embraced by football fans and fashionistas, done in nubuck suede.First introduced in 1979 for elite handball players, these shoes are now beloved for their classic style. This version is built with a suede upper for a supple feel. A soft gum rubber outsole keeps them true to their vintage roots.

name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Mountain Bike Shoes

These shoes have a sock-like design that molds to your feet and a BOOST midsole that returns energy with every step. name: Barricade Tennis Shoes
description: Supportive hard court shoes made in part with recycled materials.Control the court to own your opponent. These adidas Barricade tennis shoes are all about helping you impose your will on every point. They include an intuitive lacing system that creates a truly custom fit and foam Geofit Sensepods for secure heel lockdown. Underneath, a cushioned Bounce midsole and TPU midfoot shank add comfort and stability. Those off-center laces keep them out of the firing line during extreme slides, making these shoes as resilient as your play.

name: Icon 8 BOOST Summer Bash Cleats

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

With hundreds of BOOST capsules bursting with energy and ultimate cushioning and comfort, some feet really can have it all.

Otherworldly adidas Adilette slides that are made with nature.What if the adidas Adilette wasn't created in 1972 for the German soccer team but as the official habitat sandal for the first-ever human colony on Mars? These slides are made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.

name: UBounce DNA Shoes

Super-comfy sneakers made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.When you want to set the pace for city adventures or casual hangouts, lace up the UBounce DNA shoes from adidas. Bounce cushioning puts an energizing spring in your step, and the rubber outsole grips the ground to keep you moving.

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 20% total of these materials.

This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

SPEED-ENHANCING RUNNING SHOES MADE FOR DAILY TRAININGWhen it comes to achieving your goals, every second counts. name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Mountain Bike Shoes
description:
The Trailcross Clip-In is Five Ten's first clip-in shoe that is specifically 'Created For Adventure'. Designed from the ground up to perform equally as well on the bike as it does when hiking off the bike.The Trailcross Clip-In is the latest addition to the Five Ten Trailcross family, designed from the ground up with adventure at its core. Packed with all the Trailcross technology, this latest model provides clip-in performance on the bike and all-day comfort when hiking off the bike. The addition of the Clip-In model takes the range to the next level, making our award-winning design available to clip-in pedal users for the first time.

The Trailcross range was built from the ground up, starting with the Five Ten dotted outsole with the addition of a recessed cleat to clip into compatible pedals. This was then refined with hiking in mind, bringing the additional ridged grip to the toe and heel. The Trailcross Clip-In is a lightweight and breathable shoe. With the need for the shoe to provide all-day comfort but also deliver across the contact points on and off the bike, the mid-sole EVA technology provides the necessary toe flex for hiking, without losing the all-important stiffness. The Trailcross Clip-In utilizes a hook and loop closure for added security and to reduce heel lift. Clip-in pedal users no longer need to compromise when planning their next adventure.

name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Mountain Bike Shoes
description:
The Trailcross Clip-In is Five Ten's first clip-in shoe that is specifically 'Created For Adventure'. Designed from the ground up to perform equally as well on the bike as it does when hiking off the bike.The Trailcross Clip-In is the latest addition to the Five Ten Trailcross family, designed from the ground up with adventure at its core. Packed with all the Trailcross technology, this latest model provides clip-in performance on the bike and all-day comfort when hiking off the bike. The addition of the Clip-In model takes the range to the next level, making our award-winning design available to clip-in pedal users for the first time.

The Trailcross range was built from the ground up, starting with the Five Ten dotted outsole with the addition of a recessed cleat to clip into compatible pedals. This was then refined with hiking in mind, bringing the additional ridged grip to the toe and heel. The Trailcross Clip-In is a lightweight and breathable shoe. With the need for the shoe to provide all-day comfort but also deliver across the contact points on and off the bike, the mid-sole EVA technology provides the necessary toe flex for hiking, without losing the all-important stiffness. The Trailcross Clip-In utilizes a hook and loop closure for added security and to reduce heel lift. Clip-in pedal users no longer need to compromise when planning their next adventure.
color: Core Black / Grey Three / Red

Elevated leather shoes by Y-3 inspired by traditional Sashiko stitching."Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

The Hicho Shoes view the classic adidas Campus shoes through the lens of Y-3. The smooth leather upper rides on a thick platform, adding height and creating a subtle statement. In a nod to the Japanese technique of Sashiko stitching, the shoes have accentuated, tonal stitching around the eyestay, heel tab, midsole and signature 3-Stripes, with all threads purposefully hanging loosely.

name: X Crazyfast.3 Laceless Turf Soccer Shoes
description:
Lightweight, laceless shoes primed for loco motion, made in part with recycled materials.The game's gone? Nah. It's just waiting for you to change it. Again. And again. Like to keep your rivals guessing? Go wild in adidas X Crazyfast. Keeping you stable at full tilt on short-bladed synthetic fiber, these laceless soccer shoes sit on a lug rubber artificial turf outsole and soft EVA midsole. Featuring extra layers only where reinforcement is required, their lightweight coated textile upper comes with a flat-knit collar that ensures you stay locked in.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Bright Royal / Cloud White / Solar Red

name: Predator Accuracy.3 Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
description:
Textured cleats for finding the target, made in part with recycled materials.Top corner. Bottom corner. All the corners. adidas Predator Accuracy is crafted for goalscoring, so you know the ball will find the net. The fun's in choosing how it gets there. These soccer cleats have a durable, coated textile forefoot that's covered in High Definition Texture for added grip on the ball. The firm ground outsole specializes in keeping you in control on dry, natural grass pitches.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Bright Royal / Cloud White / Bliss Blue

name: NMD_R1 Shoes

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

name: NMD_R1 Shoes
description:
Modern and comfortable shoes made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.The adidas NMD_R1 has shaped the modern streetwear scene. Ever since it debuted back in 2015, the silhouette has gained global appeal and countless variations. A testament to timeless design, this pair highlights the strengths of the knit textile upper with a paisley print look. All the technical aspects including the responsive BOOST cushioning continue to set the standard for what comfort is meant to be.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
color: Wonder Taupe / Aluminium / Clear Pink

name: Nora Shoes
description: Tennis-inspired heritage for skateboarding by Nora.Nora Vasconcellos' signature model for adidas Skateboarding mixes her unique and expressive style with design cues from the tennis archives. An homage to her roots and the shoes she coveted coming up, the Nora employs a breathable mesh and leather upper with a classic Rod-Laver-inspired colorway. It adds a vintage-inspired suede toe cap and Adituff backing for durability and wear-resistance. The grippy flexible cupsole construction offers impact absorption with the sleek and slim aesthetic of a vulc.
color: Cloud White / Chalk White / Collegiate Navy

name: Adilette Shower Slides
description: Shower slides for versatile comfort.From the pool deck to the shower to the couch, these slides are made for the work-hard-rest-hard lifestyle. The slip-on construction gives you a snug fit that's easy to kick on and off as needed. Lightweight cushioning keeps your feet cradled in all-day comfort. The adidas script logo adds an extra touch of class to the iconic Adilette look.
color: Almost Pink S22 / Acid Red S22 / Chalk White

name: Pureboost 22 Running Shoes
description: Daily running shoes made in part with recycled materials.You don't have to run far to feel the benefits of training. Slip on these adidas shoes, and you're only a few miles away from a good mood. They're designed for short runs, with a BOOST midsole that offers incredible energy return with every step. The Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energized ride, and Continental™ Rubber gives you superior traction.
color: Core Black / Pulse Mint S22 / Cloud White

name: Puremotion Adapt Shoes
description:
Slip-on shoes with a sophisticated look, made in part with recycled materials.With life on the go, stay ready in these adidas shoes. The smooth silhouette bring a sleek look to your style. The slip-on construction and elastic strap make them easy to step into when life gets hectic. adidas graphics along the strap elevate the look. A Cloudfoam sockliner brings unstoppable comfort.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Dash Grey / Silver Violet / Silver Dawn
